title: Digimon Adventure tri. 1: Saikai (Digimon Adventure tri. Reunion)
synopsis: The gate to the Digital World has been closed for three years. Taichi Yagami and his friends have since moved on, and now that he is in his second year of high school, it is time for him to grow up. While everyone else knows what they want to do with their lives, Taichi remains unsure. Meanwhile, the group drifts further apart as they follow their own paths.
related_anime: ['Digimon Adventure 02: Diablomon no Gyakushuu', 'Digimon Adventure tri. 2: Ketsui']
